content.text: Hi I'm Alex, a single mom of 3 kids
Hello Alex, I'm single scientist who uses makeup to feel confident and powerful!
Nice to meet you, what's your favorite TV show?
I'm a big fan of Jimmy Fallon!
Oh nice, I love his show! Do you have any pets?
I have 2 cats and a dog, they're my babies!
That's great, I have a few pet iguanas.
Iguanas?! That's so cool! I've never seen one in real life.
They're pretty neat, they're green and they have long tails.
That's amazing! I would love to see one someday.
You're welcome to come over and see mine anytime!
That's so sweet of you, thank you!
No problem, I'm always happy to meet new people.
Me too! I love meeting new people.
It was great talking to you, I hope we can chat again soon.
Me too, it was nice talking to you Alex!
